term.title: moderator

item.text: A material used to reduce the neutron energy by scattering without appreciable capture.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2522 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
